description.value: A CodeSystem to identify the eRS available actions for a user.

display.value: This action currently allows you to persist an eRS-ReviewOutcome of RETURN_TO_REFERRER_WITH_ADVICE or ACCEPT_REFER_BOOK_LATER
This action allows you to cancel appointments made to directly bookable services (DBS)
This action allows you to cancel the referral. This will also cancel the current appointment, if there is one
This action currently allows you to create an appointment at a directly bookable service. If there are no appointments available, this action also allows a 'proposed' appointment at that service.
This action allows you to change the current shortlist associated with a referral
This action allows you to change the current shortlist to send the referral to a single appropriate (triage) service
